pages.text: Most mods in Vault Hunters are $(l)locked$() behind $(l)Research$(). Mods can be researched with the use of craftable $(l)Knowledge Points$().

When a mod is researched, it might $(l)increase$() the Knowledge Point costs of mods in that research group, but other research groups will stay unaffected. $(br2)Researching some mods also discovers a special $(l)Transmog$() of that mod that can be applied to $(l)Vault Gear$()
